I can assure you the internet is already censored, sure you can find truth here and there but whenever something becomes too popular or a web resource is too accurate and impactful it gets shut-down eventually. This has been with us since the dawn of the Internet.

But it can, and will likely become worse and worse. "Intolerance" will be a censorable thing soon (United Nations legislation).
